Plot: Kids show host Rainbow Randolph is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the kid's TV business isn't all child's play.
Title: Death to Smoochy
Actors: Robin Williams, Edward Norton, Catherine Keener, Danny DeVito
tomatoConsensus: The talent involved can't save a script that has nowhere to go with its promising premise.
